content: --दंडिन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {1} areligious mendicant or {%Saṃnyāsin%} who has renounced all worldly attachments, and who carries three long staves tied together so as to form one in his right hand. {2} one who has obtained command over his mind, speech, and body (or thought, word, and deed), <ab>cf.</ab> वाग्दंडोऽथ मनोदंडः कायदंडस्तथैव च . यस्यैते निहिता बुद्धौ विदंडीति स उच्यते .. <ls>Ms. 12. 10.</ls>
